Title: Authorizes the commissioner of education to make a payment for building aid to which the Norwich city school district is entitled
Summary: Authorizes the commissioner of education to make a payment for building aid to which the Norwich city school district is entitled in the amount of $850,684 no later than June 30, 2020 to be used for services and expenses of such school district.
ActClause: AN ACT authorizing the commissioner of education to make a payment for building aid to which the Norwich city school district is entitled to be used for services and expenses of such school district
